P

pantherbuddy - package pantherbuddy
The package represents the top most package of the Panther Buddy system.
pantherbuddy.business - package pantherbuddy.business
The package contains the implementation of the application logic/ bussiness tier of the 3-tier architecture followed for developing the PantherBuddy system.
pantherbuddy.business.controller - package pantherbuddy.business.controller
The package contains the implementation of the Controller component of the MVC architecture followed for developing the PantherBuddy system application tier.
pantherbuddy.business.controller.account - package pantherbuddy.business.controller.account
Contains the business object classes pertaining to the user account.
pantherbuddy.business.controller.action - package pantherbuddy.business.controller.action
The package contains all the actions that can be executed.
pantherbuddy.business.controller.control - package pantherbuddy.business.controller.control
The package contains the entrypoint to the controller implementation.
pantherbuddy.business.controller.exceptions - package pantherbuddy.business.controller.exceptions
The package contains the business exceptions thrown by the system.
pantherbuddy.business.controller.message - package pantherbuddy.business.controller.message
Contains the business object classes pertaining to the messages.
pantherbuddy.business.controller.utility - package pantherbuddy.business.controller.utility
The package contains the utility classes used by the system.
pantherbuddy.business.model - package pantherbuddy.business.model
The package contains the implementation of the Model component of the MVC architecture followed for developing the PantherBuddy system application tier.
pantherbuddy.business.view - package pantherbuddy.business.view
The package contains the implementation of the View component of the MVC architecture followed for developing the PantherBuddy system application tier.
pantherbuddy.datastore - package pantherbuddy.datastore
The package contains the implementation of the data tier of the 3-tier architecture followed for developing the PantherBuddy system.
pantherbuddy.datastore.dao - package pantherbuddy.datastore.dao
The package contains the implementation of data access objects for user account and messages.
pantherbuddy.datastore.entity - package pantherbuddy.datastore.entity
The package contains the entities used by the Panther Buddy system.
pantherbuddy.presentation - package pantherbuddy.presentation
The package contains the implementation of the presentation tier of the 3-tier architecture followed for developing the PantherBuddy system.
password - Variable in class pantherbuddy.business.model.UserModel
The password used by the user
password - Variable in class pantherbuddy.business.view.ChangePasswordForm
The old password of the user
password - Variable in class pantherbuddy.business.view.LoginForm
The password entered by the user.
password - Variable in class pantherbuddy.datastore.entity.User
The password used by the user
password_retype - Variable in class pantherbuddy.business.model.UserModel
The field holds the value for the retyped new password when the user is changing his password in the system.
password_retype - Variable in class pantherbuddy.business.view.ChangePasswordForm
The new password retyrped by the user.
PasswordGenerator - Class in pantherbuddy.business.controller.utility
The utility class is used to generate a random password for an user.
PasswordGenerator() - Constructor for class pantherbuddy.business.controller.utility.PasswordGenerator
 
phoneNumber - Variable in class pantherbuddy.business.model.UserModel
The phone number of the user.
phoneNumber - Variable in class pantherbuddy.business.view.RegistrationForm
The phone number of the user
phoneNumber - Variable in class pantherbuddy.business.view.ViewProfileForm
The phone number of the user.
phoneNumber - Variable in class pantherbuddy.datastore.entity.User
The phone number of the user.
PostMessageAction - Class in pantherbuddy.business.controller.action
Action class for Post Message.
PostMessageAction() - Constructor for class pantherbuddy.business.controller.action.PostMessageAction
 
PostMessageForm - Class in pantherbuddy.business.view
Represents the view for the post message use case.
PostMessageForm() - Constructor for class pantherbuddy.business.view.PostMessageForm
